shortdesc.ph: Structure to configure the type and frequency of the video content moderation module.

plentry.pd: The type of video content moderation module. See .

pd.p:
The type of video content moderation module.
(0): (Default) This module has no actual function. Do not set to this value.
(1): Video content moderation. SDK takes screenshots, inspects video content of the video stream in the channel, and uploads the screenshots and moderation results.
(2): Screenshot capture. SDK takes screenshots of the video stream in the channel and uploads them.

plentry.pd: The frequency (in seconds) of video content moderation. The value should be set as larger than 0. If set as 0 (default), the video content is not inspected. Agora recommends that you set the value as 10; you can also adjust it according to your business needs.
